price: Cyangwa mwibwira ko muzinjira mu ijuru Allah atari yabagerageza ngo yerekane abaharaniye inzira ye n’abihangana muri mwe?
arabic: أَمۡ حَسِبۡتُمۡ أَن تَدۡخُلُواْ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ وَلَمَّا يَعۡلَمِ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ جَٰهَدُواْ مِنكُمۡ وَيَعۡلَمَ ٱلصَّٰبِرِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: am ḥasib'tum an tadkhulū al-janata walammā yaʿlami al-lahu alladhīna jāhadū minkum wayaʿlama al-ṣābirīna
